metadata.synopsis: When Jasper (Jim Dale), founder of the western town of Bloodshy, dies, his twin sons face off to decide who will inherit his legacy. Billy (also Dale) is a wild gunslinger, while Eli (also Dale) is a mild-mannered, religious type. To decide the town's rightful successor, the brothers duel each other in a series of oddball competitions that culminate in a zany train race. But the real battle begins when Billy and Eli try to wrest control from Bloodshy's crooked mayor, Ragsdale (Darren McGavin).

reviews: Disney fun circa 1978, and so typical of its time.
